title: SimplyClean Handheld Shower Head Fixture - Classic, Chrome - 5 Spray Settings
description: Whether you've spent your day doing dirty yard work or behind a desk at the office, the SimplyClean shower is a trusted shower of choice. Designed with the latest style trends in mind and manufactured to the highest quality standards, SimplyClean showers get you clean - No matter how dirty your days become. This SimplyClean showerhead offers 5 unique spray settings: Full Body Wash, Power, Massage, Soft Spray & Drenching. Full Body Wash provides the widest coverage for a complete cleanse. Drenching Spray provides larger water streams creating a heavy rinse. Power spray is a targeted water stream great for shampoo rinsing and shower cleaning. Soft Spray is a light mist ideal for sensitive skin. Massage is a pulsating spray excellent for sore muscles aches & pains. Featuring a 4" face to provide maximum coverage, along with a 72" extra reach long hose perfect for washing children, pets and keeping your shower spotless. Meets EPA Criteria for 2.0 or less GPM and is WaterSense Certified with Rub Clean Nozzles that resist mineral build up for easy cleaning, & Easy-to-change spray settings. Installs in less than 5 minutes, Fits all standard shower arms and comes with a Limited Lifetime Warranty. Includes: Easy to follow instructions, Handheld Shower Head, Hose & Handheld Bracket. SimplyClean - For EVERY kind of dirty.
